      • getInstance

      • createQuester

        public Quester createQuester(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player)
        Creates a Quester object for the Player and stores it into the database. Also caches it for easier access.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who is to have a Quester object created.
        Returns:
        The Quester object.

      • addQuester

        public void addQuester(Quester quester)

      • getQuester

        public Quester getQuester(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player)
        Gets a player's Quester object. If player has no associated Quester object, this method will create one via createQuester(Player).
        Parameters:
        player - the player whose Quester object is to be retrieved
        Returns:
        The question object

      • hasQuester

        public boolean hasQuester(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player)
        Returns whether or not the player has an associated Quester object.
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose Quester object is to be tested for
        Returns:
        true if a Quester object is found, false if not
